title: Exapostilarion 5
content: Christ our Way and our Life, * after His resurrection from the dead, * accompanied Luke and Cleopas, * who had recognized Him at Emmaus in the breaking of the bread.* Their hearts and souls were inflamed as He spoke to them on the way, * explaining to them all the Scriptures that pertained to Him.* Let us, therefore, shout with them, saying:* Truly, the Lord is risen and has appeared to Peter.
